short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly shows everything you need to know about your VivifyScrum Items in your Inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The fastest and easiest way to see all the important stuff about VivifyScrum Items right from your Gmail Inbox. 
VivifyScrum for Gmail provides: 
 * Item details: Author, Assignee, Reviewers, Item type, Priority, Value and Labels 
 * Item location: Board, Sprint and Column it belongs to 
 * Button ‘View in VivifyScrum’ that takes you directly to your Item
